prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with an event chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What were Stefan's thoughts, actions, and emotions towards me in this moment at the restaurant family dinner?

Since this chart is drawn up for a specific past event, Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant (1st house) in this chart, and I should be represented by his 11th house (group member).

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the chart using event chart principles (I believe they are similar to horary principles). Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a structured list of the chart data relevant for an event chart reading using horary/event chart principles, with Stefan represented by the Ascendant (1st house) and Melissa by the 11th house:

1. Planetary Placements and House Positions
 • Ascendant: 14° Aries (1st House – represents Stefan)
  – Contains Uranus (27° Taurus, retrograde) and Chiron (22° Aries, retrograde)
 • 11th House: Begins at 22° Capricorn
  – Contains Pluto (29° Capricorn, retrograde) so Pluto becomes a key indicator for Melissa
 • Other notable planetary placements (by house):
  – 2nd House (Gemini): Jupiter at 20°59' Gemini
  – 3rd House (Gemini): Moon at 1°25' Cancer
  – 4th House (Cancer): Mars at 11°29' Cancer
  – 6th House (Leo): Sun at 2° Libra and Mercury at 27°2' Virgo
  – 7th House (Libra): Venus at 1°58' Scorpio
  – 12th House (Aquarius): Saturn at 14°47' Pisces (r), Neptune at 28°24' Pisces (r), and North Node at 6°42' Aries (r)

2. Major Aspects (with low-orb aspects emphasized):
 • North Node Square IC (orb 0°) and North Node Square MC (orb 0°)
 • MC Opposition IC (orb 0°)
 • Mercury Trine Uranus (orb 0°)
 • Moon Trine Venus (orb 0°)
 • Neptune Sextile Pluto (orb 1°) and Uranus Sextile Neptune (orb 1°)
 • Sun Square Moon (orb 1°)
 • Mercury Opposition Neptune (orb 1°)
 • Jupiter Sextile Chiron (orb 2°)
 • Venus Square Pluto (orb 2°)
 • Uranus Trine Pluto (orb 2°) and Mercury Trine Pluto (orb 2°)
 • Mars Square Ascendant (orb 3°) – a noteworthy aspect for Stefan’s immediate action or impulse
 • Moon Square Neptune (orb 3°) and Mars Trine Saturn (orb 3°)
 • Sun Trine Pluto (orb 3°)
 • Further wider orbs include: Moon Square Mercury (orb 4°), Sun Square both IC and MC (orb 4°), Sun Opposition North Node and Neptune (orb 4°)
 • Additional aspects involving the MC, Ascendant, and important house cusps include Venus Sextile MC (orb 5°), Mars Opposition MC (orb 5°), Moon Opposition MC (orb 5°), Mars and Moon Conjunctions with IC (orb 5°) and Sun Conjunction Mercury (orb 5°)

3. Patterned Configurations:
 • Grand Trine: Involving Sun (2° Libra), Pluto (29° Capricorn), Uranus (27° Taurus), and Mercury (27° Virgo)
 • Kite Formation: Involving the above Grand Trine with Neptune (28° Pisces) providing an extension
 • Grand Cross: Formed by MC (6° Capricorn), North Node (6° Aries), IC (6° Cancer), and Sun (2° Libra)

4. Special Features and Additional Considerations:
 • The chart displays a See Saw shape, with many inner planets in the left hemisphere (west of the MC–IC axis)
 • A dominant Cardinal mode is present among the inner planets
 • A high frequency of Square aspects (12 total) indicates tension or dynamic conflict
 • Multiple planets are retrograde (Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto, North Node, Chiron) which can intensify introspection and internalized energies
 • Notable dignities: Moon in Cancer and Neptune in Pisces are in their own rulership signs, highlighting emotional and intuitive currents
 • The Moon is a last quarter moon, which can signify a turning point or completion phase in the event’s unfolding

5. Specific Relevance to the Query
 • For Stefan (1st house/Ascendant), attention should focus on:
  – The Ascendant itself (Aries qualities, assertive and impulsive energy)
  – Aspects to the Ascendant, notably Mars square Ascendant, suggesting raw personal drive or potential internal conflict in conscious reactions
  – Uranus and Chiron in the 1st house, which introduce themes of sudden change or unresolved wounds in matters of self-expression and identity
 • For Melissa (11th house), key factors include:
  – Pluto’s presence in Capricorn, hinting at transformative, intense, or deeply unconscious dynamics
  – Any aspects linking Pluto (11th house) with Saturn, Neptune, or Venus may reveal the nature of Stefan’s underlying emotions and actions toward her within the context of their shared social or group setting

This detailed list of planetary positions, aspects, patterns, and special features should serve as the factual basis awaiting further interpretation. Please confirm if you require additional clarifications or move forward to the interpretive phase based on this compiled dataset.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is the interpretation based on the event chart data and horary principles:

1. Stefan’s Initial Presence and Immediate Reaction
• The Ascendant in Aries—representing Stefan—imparts assertiveness and sudden, impulsive energy. The square from Mars (orb 3°) to the Ascendant indicates that in this moment he acted on a raw, instinctive drive.
• Uranus’s presence in the 1st house suggests a sudden, unexpected quality in his demeanor. This factor can contribute to volatile responses or behavior that feels unpredictable.
• Chiron in the 1st house may indicate that underlying wounds or unresolved issues influenced his approach; his actions may carry an element of personal vulnerability even amid assertiveness.

2. Analysis of Inner Tensions and Conflicts
• The Sun square Moon (orb 1°) shows an internal conflict between what he consciously expresses (the Sun) and his deeper emotional state (the Moon). This aspect tells us that his outer behavior did not fully reflect his inner emotional turmoil.
• Mercury opposition Neptune (orb 1°) implies a tension between clarity of thought and an idealized or confused state of mind. Stefan may have struggled with seeing the situation with absolute clarity, adding ambiguity to his thoughts and actions.
• With additional squares involving the Sun to the IC and MC and the opposition to the North Node and Neptune, there is evidence of ongoing tension between his inner world and his public persona. This could have manifested as conflicted signals during the dinner.

3. Melissa’s Role and the Underlying Intensity
• Melissa is represented by the 11th house and Pluto in Capricorn. Pluto’s influence here brings transformative, intense, and possibly secretive energies.
• The Venus square Pluto aspect (orb 2°) underscores a powerful, magnetic, and sometimes coercive attraction. Stefan’s inner feelings toward Melissa were likely charged and tinged with intensity that borders on being overwhelming. It hints at deep, instinctual attraction mixed with a recognition of transformative potential – or risk – if involvement were to progress.
• Pluto’s presence in the 11th house can also signify that Stefan recognized something elemental and possibly subversive in his connection with Melissa; he sensed that the interaction was more than a simple social encounter.

4. Overall Emotional and Mental State
• With the Sun and Mercury grouped in the 6th house (in Leo and Virgo respectively), the conscious mind is somewhat focused on daily, practical matters. However, aspects to Pluto, Uranus, and the North Node suggest that beneath the surface, Stefan’s focus was drawn to deeper relational dynamics.
• The configuration of squares and oppositions, especially involving the Moon and the inner planets, confirms that his thoughts and emotions were conflicted. He experienced a tension between instinctive attraction and the more reasoned, possibly socially or emotionally complicated, appraisal of the situation.
• The grand trine and kite formations (involving the Sun, Mercury, Uranus, Pluto, and Neptune) provide an undercurrent of creative potential and transformative energy. His internal dialogue likely mixed moments of sudden insight with periods of confusion and cautioned rationality.

5. Summary of Thoughts, Actions, and Emotions
• Thoughts: Stefan was mentally conflicted. His mind was caught between an immediate, instinctive pull toward Melissa and a clouded deliberation shaped by past experiences and internal sensitivities.
• Actions: His behavior, marked by the assertiveness of his Aries Ascendant and the drive indicated by the Mars square Ascendant, was sudden and possibly erratic. He might have acted impulsively or displayed unexpected reactions during the dinner.
• Emotions: The strong Pluto influence and the square aspects involving the Moon reveal that his feelings toward Melissa were intense and transformative, edged with a blend of attraction, desire, and internal turmoil. These emotions were not straightforward but covered by layers of unconscious triggers, possibly related to past wounds (Chiron) or repressed emotional dynamics.

Based on these specific elements in the chart—the Ascendant’s assertive start, Mars’s direct influence indicating impulsivity, and the heavy Pluto and square dynamics affecting emotional clarity—the indication is that in this moment, Stefan experienced a rapidly evolving internal state. He was drawn powerfully to Melissa, yet his actions at the dinner were punctuated by internal conflict, creating a tension between what he felt and what he consciously chose to express.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, madam. Is there any indication as to what triggered this? Was there anything that I did? Or is it something else?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Melissa, the chart suggests that his reaction was less about a specific action on your part and more a convergence of his own intense astrological factors. Key points include:

• Mars square the Ascendant indicates that his response was impulsive and fueled by inner conflict rather than a controlled reaction to an external trigger.
• The strong Pluto presence in your 11th house amplifies your natural magnetism, activating deep, transformative energies in him. This magnetism likely stirred an unconscious response rather than a deliberate provocation.
• Other square aspects—such as the Sun square Moon and Mercury opposing Neptune—point to internal tension and conflicting impulses governing his thoughts and behavior. These aspects indicate he was grappling with his own unresolved issues and sensitivities at the moment.
• The overall configuration implies that while your energy was a catalyst, his reaction originated primarily from internal forces and complex emotional dynamics already in play.

Based on these factors, the indication is that his behavior was triggered by personal internal tension and strain, with your presence simply accentuating these underlying issues.
